metadata.title: CVE-2023-28852 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: GLPI is a free asset and IT management software package. Starting inversion 9.5.0 and prior to versions 9.5.13 and 10.0.7, a user withdashboard administration rights may hack the dashboard form to storemalicious code that will be executed when other users will use the relateddashboard. Versions 9.5.13 and 10.0.7 contain a patch for this issue.

criterions.comment: glpi: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
